modName: Lorecraft - Vicious Weapons and Vicious Heart
summary: Adds Vicious Weapons and Vicious heart to Lorecraft
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6]LORECRAFT[/size][/b]
[size=4]
VICIOUS WEAPONS
CONTENT PLUGIN

[/size]
[size=4]


** BUGGY ***
Swords can replace daedric and do some weird stuff. This plugin is very old, the original may have been fixed already. Anyone is free to update THIS PLUGIN and maintain it on their own page. Don\'t forget the credits for meshes/textures.

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft 3.0+ [/url]
by ArcaneSmith


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/search.php?name=lorecraft&scid=&author=&mname=&desc=&size1=&size2=&downloads1=&downloads2=&udate1_day=&udate1_month=&udate1_year=&udate2_day=&udate2_month=&udate2_year=&ldate1_day=&ldate1_month=&ldate1_year=&ldate2_day=&ldate2_month=&ldate2_year=&endorsements=&images=&readme=&adultonly=&opensource=&page=1] ALL RELEASED CONTENT PLUGINS HERE[/url]
[/size]

[size=3]Create your own content plugin: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=50375] GET THE GUIDE HERE[/url][/size]


[/center]

[b][size=3] CREDITS[/b][/size]

- Vicious Heart with sfx
 Gizmodian for meshes and textures of Copperthorn
 Gizmodian for meshes and textures of The Vicious Heart
Sushiyant for mixing the meshes and some retexturing
Sushiyant for importing it to skyrim
Coklafor making this a standalone version

- Vicious Weapons (the golden ones)
 Gizmodian (The Vicious Heart mesh)
 Mystikhybrid (all the rest)



[b][size=3] FEATURES[/b][/size]
[list]

[*] Adds 4 mini bosses that drop one book for each sword
[*] They spawn once, one at time, in Blackreach, after your kill something (tied to Lorecraft\'s DROP rate, you need to be lvl 35+)

[/list]

[b][size=3]WHAT\'S LORECRAFT?[/b][/size]

Check [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft\'s Core page [/url]
And here\'s an interview at [url=http://www.skyrimforge.com/announcements/mod-interview-with-arcane-smith-lorecraft] Skyrim Forge [/url]



[b][size=3]COMMENTS/BUG REPORT[/b][/size]

Post them [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]here[/url]
author: ArcaneSmith
